column4: Does anyone know how to get Regnum online to run in windowed mode?
KM0201!! Hey buuuuuddy!
i have been telling Angelic to search google and try to run the usb adapter native if its possible, thats what i have to do to get rid of that, but i got a different adapter
hmm.
a desktop launcher, can only launch one program at a time...
oh i see what you're saying... sometimes you can look at system monitor, and find the process in there, and then try to start the program w/ whatever name is there.
whats the name fo the program?
if the program ahs a menu entry, you can also go to it int he menu and choose "add to desktop" and it will copy a launcher to the desktop
what terminal emulator are you running?  gnome-terminal or what?
it's not closing when i run it.
which terminal emulator are you using?

thats a desktop environment.. you're probably using gnome-terminal... try this... open a terminal, edit/profile preferences/ title and commands tab... at the bottom "When command exits" change it to "Hold terminal Open"
\o/oot
my WoW is running at higher graphics on Ubuntu 11.04 Classic (No Effects) than it was on Win 7, so my nuking win7 was a WOOT!
NOO!! phong_ don't do that
don't do what?
yay, told you... that apt-get gives you the old one
thats why i stopped mid sentence..lol, i remembered the one in the repos sucks.
you have been the most cosistantly helpful person for complete n00bS that I have seen in a while
meh... i had a lot of help when i was new.. "pay it forward"
